content.title: Intro
content.content: -ndur, -nur is a Quenya suffix added to names to indicate faithful service or servitude.[1]

content.title: Examples
content.content:
Arandur = "Steward" (literally "King-servant")
Eärendur/Earnur = "Servant of the Sea, mariner"
Elendur = "Servant of the Elves"
Cemendur = "Servant of the Earth" (i.e. farmer?)
Isildur = "Devoted to the Moon"
Meneldur = "Servant of Heaven, astronomer"
Pelendur = "Servant of the Border"
Valandur = "Servant of the Valar"
